body.p:
Lawrenceburg Ky May 17th 1865
To the Hon Tho. E. Bramlette
Govener of the State of Ky

Your petitioners respectfully sheweth that Lemuel Hammond at the present term of the Anderson County Circuit court was found guility of Malicious shooting at and wounding of one Thos Price and his penalty for said crime fixed by the Jury at confinement in the state Penatentiary for a the time period of one year We would respectfully represent that said Hammond is an old man having a wife and large family dependent on him for support. that in an unguarded moment he committed the offense for which he was found guilty that he is not a hardened criminal, steeped in crime & iniquity, but, before this unfortunate occurance ^he^ was held in high esteem by the citizens of this county, having been elected many times to the position of Jailor and holding said position at the present time. We would earnestly reccommend him to executive clemency and pray you to pardon him of said charge & conviction --

W. H. Witherspoon
